Rule.RuleName: WEB - Must have SSW drop down menu
Rule.SearchString: <script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript" src="Template_files/MenuDropDown\.js"></script>\s*<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript" src="Template_files/MenuDropDownData\.js"></script>\s*<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript">\s*showToolbar();\s*\*? updateIt();\s*</script>

Rule.RuleName: WEB - Double links to same URL.

Rule.RuleNote: String variables needs to start with str prefix
http://www.ssw.com.au/SSW/KB/KB.asp?KBID=Q849278
At SSW we prefix zz to files we no longer think we need, before we actually delete them.

BAD x as System.Windows.Forms.Button x.Text = "ok"
GOOD x as System.Windows.Forms.Button x x.Text = "&ok"
http://www.ssw.com.au/SSW/Standards/Rules/RulestoBetterInterfaces.aspx#UseMnemonic
A beep before the MessageBox to ensure user attention. http://www.ssw.com.au/ssw/standards/rules/RulestoBetterCode.aspx#beepmsg

Rule.RuleName: TEXT. LF OR CRLF, NO CR
WEB - No UNC in HTML Link
WEB - No Absolute Path In HREF (excluding SSW)

Rule.RuleNote: ID and NAME tokens must begin with a letter ([A-Za-z]) and may be followed by any number of letters, digits ([0-9]), hyphens ("-"), underscores ("_"), colons (":"), and periods (".").

Rule.RuleName: Images should be in the images directory
Rule.RuleNote: http://www.ssw.com.au/SSW/Methodology/RulestoBetterWebsites.aspx#WebsiteStructure

Rule.RuleName: WEB - No font tags to be used - use css instead
Rule.RuleNote: http://www.ssw.com.au/SSW/Standards/Rules/RulestoBetterWebsites.aspx#AvoidFONTTags

Regular Expression - Find any if statements that are not followed by a curly bracket ({). Ignore statements that have been commented out. Options: Multiline, IgnoreCase, IgnorePatternwhitespace
Ross Donald
Some phrases are long winded and unnecessary. This check highlights the problems.
http://www.ssw.com.au/SSW/KB/KB.asp?KBID=Q849278

(?-i:(?:O|o)k)
This rule requires the Case-Insensitive to be turned off.

Rule.RuleName: WEB - Title tag after HEAD element
Rule.RuleNote:
Having text (eg META) between <HEAD> and <TITLE> element isn't very good for search engines. Always have <TITLE> right after <HEAD>
http://www.solution-shelf.com/FrontPage/ErrOmi/EO_FAQ.htm

Rule.SearchString: Copyright 2\d+ Superior Software for Windows.*www\.ssw\.com\.au All Rights Reserved

Rule.RuleNote: hippo hippo Try test on: 你好

Rule.RuleName: WEB - No Absolute Path in HREF

Rule.RuleNote: try { } catch(Exception e) { } try { } catch { }

Sub Main
AddHandler Application.ThreadException, addressof ExceptionManager.ThreadExceptionHandler
End Sub
Version info must exists within AssemblyInfo
Version info must exists within AssemblyInfo

Rule.RuleName: WEB - No CSS with HTTP reference
Rule.RuleNote:
In Internet Explorer, if you are getting your CSS style sheet from an off-site source, it will be treated as unsafe external data, and hence you won't be able to save your webpage. (Yes, nasty, we know).
So you need to use a local copy of your css.
URL should have consistent casing, since Google ranking are case sensitive. See: www.ssw.com.au/ssw/Standards/Rules/RulestoBetterGoogleRankings.aspx#URLCaseSensitive

Rule.RuleName: WEB - Google Alt Or Title in Image Tag
Rule.RuleNote: Image should have Alt or Title attribute for Google to rank. http://www.ssw.com.au/SSW/Standards/Rules/RulesToBetterGoogleRankings.aspx#Alt

This rule ensure better Google rating by checking all link have proper name and no link with name “Click Here” or “More” http://www.ssw.com.au/SSW/Standards/Rules/RulesToBetterGoogleRankings.aspx#Relevancy

Rule.RuleName: VB 006 - Proper Name For Boolean Property
Rule.RuleNote: The rule check for Any Boolean property that doesn’t start with “Is”, “Has”, “Can”, “Should” and doesn’t end with “ed” http://www.ssw.com.au/SSW/Standards/Rules/RulestoBetterCode.aspx#BooleanPropertyNamingConventions

Rule.RuleName: C# - Proper Name For Boolean Property
Rule.RuleNote: The rule check for Any Boolean property that doesn’t start with “Is”, “Has”, “Can”, “Should” and doesn’t end with “ed” http://www.ssw.com.au/SSW/Standards/Rules/RulestoBetterCode.aspx#BooleanPropertyNamingConventions
